page.title: 07EDUCATION IN LECHLADE
page.content: { Lechlade Playgroup}began in 1982, 61 children aged 3-4 years attend morning or afternoon sessions.{St. Lawrence {C.of E. Primary School}has 143 children aged 4-11 years in five classes. It is hidden behind the trees and the church. We can have school dinners or packed lunches and eat outside in the summer. We have a computer room and a swimming pool. Secondary education is provided at {Farmor's Comprehensive School Fairford. Four coaches collect children from Lechlade and take them to and from school each day. { The Convent of St. Clotilde, Lechlade Manor, is a private day and boarding school for girls. Six of the staff are members of the community. There is a 6th. Form for girls taking 'A' levels.
